Articles.Content:
Have you ever wanted to build a house, a village, a city in KSP, but don\'t want to use wing pieces to do it? Well here is a solution. Now i\'m not much of an RP\'er but I want the ability to do this, so I have started on my first mod project. When finished this mod pack will include DIY building construction pieces, as well as one piece houses. I have an idea for a chimney part that puffs smoke, and a lot of other things. As I am an amateur at blender and have no modding experience it will be a long learning curve, but I am determined to do this.

First I will work on one piece houses, before moving on to more complex things. I have plans for a playground for kerbals to have fun in aswell.

Please tell me what you think and PM me if you want to help.
